data.name: s0
data.value: The Tidings

data.name: s1
data.value: Bismillah hir rahman nir raheem {In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful}

data.name: s10
data.value: Waja’alna naumakum subata {And made your sleep [a means for] rest}

data.name: s11
data.value: Waja’alnal laila libasa {And made the night as clothing}

data.name: s12
data.value: Waja’alnan nahara ma ‘aasha {And made the day for livelihood}

data.name: s13
data.value: Wa banaina fauqakum sab ‘an shi daada {And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]}

data.name: s14
data.value: Waja’alna siraajaw wah haaja {And made [therein] a burning lamp}

data.name: s15
data.value: Wa anzalna minal m’usiraati maa-an thaj-jaaja {And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water}

data.name: s16
data.value: Linukh rija bihee habbaw wana baata {That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation}

data.name: s17
data.value: Wa jan naatin alfafa {And gardens of entwined growth}

data.name: s18
data.value: Inna yaumal-fasli kana meeqaata {Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time –}

data.name: s19
data.value: Yauma yun fakhu fis-soori fataa toona afwaaja {The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes}

data.name: s2
data.value: ‘Amma Yatasaa-aloon {About what are they asking one another?}

data.name: s20
data.value: Wa futiha tis samaa-u fakaanat abwaaba {And the heaven is opened and will become gateways}

data.name: s21
data.value: Wa suyyi raatil jibaalu fa kaanat saraaba {And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage}

data.name: s22
data.value: Inna jahan nama kaanat mirsaada {Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait}

data.name: s23
data.value: Lit taa gheena ma aaba {For the transgressors, a place of return,}

data.name: s24
data.value: Laa bitheena feehaa ahqaaba {In which they will remain for ages [unending].}

data.name: s25
data.value: Laa ya zooqoona feeha bar daw walaa sharaaba {They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink}

data.name: s26
data.value: Illa hamee maw-wa ghas saaqa {Except scalding water and [foul] purulence –}

data.name: s27
data.value: Jazaa-aw wi faaqa {An appropriate recompense}

data.name: s28
data.value: Innahum kaanu laa yarjoona hisaaba {Indeed, they were not expecting an account}

data.name: s29
data.value: Wa kazzabu bi aayaa tina kizzaba {And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial}

data.name: s3
data.value: ‘Anin-nabaa-il ‘azeem {About the great news –}

data.name: s30
data.value: Wa kulla shai-in ahsai naahu kitaa ba {But all things We have enumerated in writing}

data.name: s31
data.value: Fa zooqoo falan-nazee dakum ill-laa azaaba {“So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment.”}

data.name: s32
data.value: Inna lil mutta qeena mafaaza {Indeed, for the righteous is attainment –}

data.name: s33
data.value: Hadaa-iqa wa a’anaa ba {Gardens and grapevines}

data.name: s34
data.value: Wa kaawa ‘iba at raaba {And full-breasted [companions] of equal age}

data.name: s35
data.value: Wa ka’san di haaqa {And a full cup}

data.name: s36
data.value: Laa yasma’oona fiha lagh waw walaa kizzaba {No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood –}

data.name: s37
data.value: Jazaa-am mir-rabbika ataa-an hisaaba {[As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,}

data.name: s38
data.value: Rabbis samaa waati wal ardi wa maa baina humar rahmaani laa yam likoona minhu khitaaba {[From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech}

data.name: s39
data.value: Yauma yaqoo mur roohu wal malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yatakallamoona ill-laa man azina lahur rahmaanu wa qaala sawaaba {The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct}

data.name: s4
data.value: Allazi hum feehi mukh talifoon {That over which they are in disagreement}

data.name: s40
data.value: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba {That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return}

data.name: s41
data.value: In naa anzar naakum azaaban qareebaiy-yauma yan zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu wa ya qoolul-kaafiru yaa lai tanee kuntu turaaba {Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, “Oh, I wish that I were dust!”}

data.name: s5
data.value: Kallaa sa y’alamoon {No! They are going to know}

data.name: s6
data.value: Thumma kallaa sa y’alamoon {Then, no! They are going to know}

data.name: s7
data.value: Alam naj’alil arda mihaa da {Have We not made the earth a resting place?}

data.name: s8
data.value: Wal jibaala au taada {And the mountains as stakes?}

data.name: s9
data.value: Wa khalaq naakum azwaaja {And We created you in pairs}
